attributes.action: Get Damien Nettles case a re investigation
attributes.background:
Damien Nettles went missing when he was 16 years old in 1996.  Please help us get a re investigation into his disappearance as police lost vital CCTV footage from the night he disappeared plus many other inconsistencies surround his disappearance
#Damiennettles

rejection.details: Reopening the Damien Nettles case would be an operational decision for the local police force. This is not something for which the UK Government or Parliament is responsible.
